description:
The DIY club suffers a massive shock. Devastated, they head home without beginning the construction of their secret hideout. When Purin hears what happened from Jobko, she digs out an old keepsake and goes to see Serufu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "DIY" Means... Rock Bottom? Impossible? With Courage and Drive, Anything Is Possible!
DIY tte, Donzoko? Impossible? Yuuki to Yaruki ga Areba Nandemo Dekiru!
DIYって, どんぞこ?・いんぽっしぶる?・ゆうきとやるきがあればなんでもできる!
